resources.string: Friends I found Awesome widget for my Android phone. Take a look here http://goo.gl/DQWrkD
Try Pro version to customize your Social Touch widget
How to create your customized widget:
I found a great social widget app...

"(1) Go to app setting.
(2) Click on Custom Tab.
(3) On TOP row choose any button to customize your widget.
(4) Then select any app from list of apps installed on your phone.
(5) Repeat setp 3-4 for all 6 icons of your widget.
(6) Click on DONE button."

"(1) Go to home screen
(2) Long press on empty area of screen.
(3) Select Widget
(4) Navigate through the list of installed widgets and select Social Touch.
(5) Click on the Social Touch widget and you will add it to your home screen.
(6) Press the “Home” key. The new widget should appear on the home screen (or wallpaper).Cheers.."
